channel.title: CVE Feed for PhpMyBackupPro -- PhpMyBackupPro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PhpMyBackupPro -- PhpMyBackupPro

item.title: CVE-2024-5415|2024-08-01T21:11:12.765Z -- phpmybackuppro -- phpmybackuppro
item.description: A vulnerability have been discovered in PhpMyBackupPro affecting version 2.3 that could allow an attacker to execute XSS through /phpmybackuppro/backup.php, 'comments' and 'db' parameters. This vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to create a specially crafted URL and send it to a victim to retrieve their session details.

item.title: CVE-2024-5414|2024-08-01T21:11:12.741Z -- phpmybackuppro -- phpmybackuppro
item.description: A vulnerability have been discovered in PhpMyBackupPro affecting version 2.3 that could allow an attacker to execute XSS through /phpmybackuppro/get_file.php, 'view' parameter. This vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to create a specially crafted URL and send it to a victim to retrieve their session details.

item.title: CVE-2024-5413|2024-08-01T21:11:12.746Z -- phpmybackuppro -- phpmybackuppro
item.description: A vulnerability have been discovered in PhpMyBackupPro affecting version 2.3 that could allow an attacker to execute XSS through /phpmybackuppro/scheduled.php, all parameters. This vulnerabilities could allow an attacker to create a specially crafted URL and send it to a victim to retrieve their session details.
